SENT.plain: We examined a possible association between subclinical hypothyroidism and albuminuria in 159 people with type 2 diabetes
Patients with subclinical hypothyroidism had significantly higher levels of urinary albumin-to-creatinine ratio (UACR) than those with euthyroidism
Multivariate logistic regression analyses demonstrated that serum TSH level was an independent risk factor of albuminuria
